Exploratory analysis

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(widyr)
library(janitor)
library(factoextra)
library(FactoMineR)
library(rgl)
library(viridis)

theme_set(theme_light())

Cucuteni_pXRF <- read_excel("Cucuteni_pXRF.xlsx", sheet = "toate fara 15 RSD>10")
Cucuteni_pXRF <- as_tibble(Cucuteni_pXRF) |> 
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) |> 
  mutate_if(is.double, as.numeric)

df <- Cucuteni_pXRF[-15,] |> #sample 15 eliminated due to errors in the analysis process
as_tibble()

View(df)

df_long <- 
  Cucuteni_pXRF |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -c("SAMPLE", "TIP"),
    names_to = "Elemente",
    values_to = "Procentaje"
    ) |> 
  unite("Sample_Element",
        c("SAMPLE", "Elemente"),
        sep = ".",
        remove = F) |> 
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) |> 
  as_tibble()

cors <- df_long |> 
  group_by(SAMPLE) |> 
  pairwise_cor(Elemente, Procentaje, sort = TRUE)
  
cors_tibble <- 
  cors |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  distinct(item1, .keep_all = T) |> 
  unite(Cor_Pairs,
        c(item1, item2),
        sep = "_vs_",
        remove = F
        ) |>
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) |> 
  top_n(20, abs(correlation)) |> 
  mutate(Cor_Pairs = fct_reorder(Cor_Pairs, correlation))

  ggplot(cors_tibble, aes(correlation, Cor_Pairs)) +
  geom_point()
```

Clusters

```{r}
gradient_col <-  list(low = "black", mid = "white",high = "red")

df_centr <- as.data.frame(scale
                          (df[,3:14], 
                            center = TRUE, 
                            scale = TRUE)
                          ) |> 
  as_tibble()

df_log <- as.data.frame(log(df[,3:14])) |> 
  as.tibble()

df_centr_selection <- as.data.frame(scale
                          (df_selection[,3:13], 
                            center = TRUE, 
                            scale = TRUE)
                          ) |> 
  as_tibble()

df_log_selection <- as.data.frame(log10(df_selection[,3:13])) |> 
  as.tibble()

cluster_tendency_df <- get_clust_tendency(df[,3:14], n = 10, gradient = gradient_col)
cluster_tendency_df

cluster_tendency_df_centr <- get_clust_tendency(df_centr, n = 10, gradient = gradient_col)      
cluster_tendency_df_centr #0.69

cluster_tendency_df_log <- get_clust_tendency(df_log, n = 10, gradient = gradient_col)      
cluster_tendency_df_log #0.68

cluster_tendency_df_centr_selection <- get_clust_tendency(df_centr_selection, 
                                                          n = 10, 
                                                          gradient = gradient_col)      
cluster_tendency_df_centr_selection #0.70

cluster_tendency_df_log_selection <- get_clust_tendency(df_log_selection, 
                                                          n = 10, 
                                                          gradient = gradient_col)      
cluster_tendency_df_log_selection #0.68



set.seed(2024)


clust_df_centr_selection <- eclust(df_centr_selection,
                        FUNcluster = "agnes",
                        hc_metric = "pearson",
                        hc_method = "average"
                        )
clusts_indet <- fviz_dend(clust_df_centr_selection)
clusts_indet

clust_df_centr_selection_tests <- eclust(df_log_selection,
                               FUNcluster = "agnes",
                               k = 4,
                               hc_metric = "pearson",
                               hc_method = "average"
                               )


fviz_silhouette(clust_df_centr_selection_tests) # 2clust=0.5; 3clust=0.46; 4clust=0.45;
                                              #5clust=0.48; 6clust=0.48; 7clust=0.5; 8clust=0.47; 9clust=0.5
dendrogram_df_log_selection <- fviz_dend(clust_df_centr_selection_tests)
dendrogram_df_log_selection


export_clus <- clust_df_centr_selection_tests$cluster
df_selection$clusters <- as.factor(export_clus)
View(df_selection)
```

MANOVA to confirm clustering and PCA

```{r}
df_confirmation <-  
  df_selection |> 
  filter(!clusters %in% c(4)) |> 
  dplyr::select(!c(TIP, SAMPLE))

View(df_confirmation)

manova_results <- manova(cbind(df_confirmation$Al2O4_avg, df_confirmation$SiO3_avg, df_confirmation$K2O_avg, df_confirmation$Ca_avg, df_confirmation$Ti_avg, df_confirmation$Mn_avg, df_confirmation$Fe_avg, df_confirmation$Zn_avg, df_confirmation$Rb_avg, df_confirmation$Sr_avg, df_confirmation$Zr_avg) ~ df_confirmation$clusters, df_confirmation)

summary.aov(manova_results)

library(effectsize)
eta_squared(manova_results) # dacă valoarea este mai mare de 0.14, mărimea efectului este mare


library(MASS)

verification_lda <- lda(df_confirmation$clusters~., df_confirmation, CV = F)
verification_lda

lda_df <- data.frame(
  clusters = df_confirmation[, "clusters"],
  lda = predict(verification_lda)$x
)
lda_df

predict_lda <- predict(verification_lda)

missclasification_lda <- table(df_confirmation$clusters, predict_lda$class)

plot(verification_lda)

ggplot(lda_df) +
  geom_point(aes(x = lda.LD1, y = lda.LD2, color = clusters), size = 4) +
  theme_light()

ggord(verification_lda, df_confirmation$clusters, ylim = c(-11, 11), xlim = c(-11, 11))
```
